channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large hole on speed bump, 24th February
item.description:
A large piece of this speed bump has broken away on left hand side just before the school entrance . I think this has been a Repair in the past. getting bigger meaning you have to veer towards centre of road to avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Layby in Innsworth Lane between Little Normans and Brionne Way, 24th February
item.description:
We witnessed the car breaking down 4 weeks ago, when we returned it had been left in the layby. There has been no sight of the owner during that time and they are not residents of the immediate area. The car is neither taxed or MOT'd so has just been abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin full, 24th February
item.description:
Bin by bus stop full and is not being fully emptied
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pot hole outside my house ! hitting it everytime i get out my driveway now getting beyond a joke , in this street sort it out, 24th February
item.description:
Outside 44 and 43 clyde road absolutely ridiculous, hole is bigger than a dinner plate getting deeper and deeper due to ppl parking in the street and having to drive through the hole all the time , and hitting it everytime we get off the driveways , why isnt it being sorted.???

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clyde Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing pothole problems, 24th February
item.description:
We would appreciate it if this situation could be reviewed and assessed, as the damage appears to be worsening. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitelands Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: 20mph school sign not lit, 24th February
item.description:
I note that this was reported a year ago. It was possibly fixed in the middle but it has not worked for months now. Lots of cars going way over 20 miles an hour this morning please fix our sign!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 64, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing potholes, 24th February
item.description:
Could someone please review how many repair attempts have been made on this road over the past year? It appears that not all potholes have been properly resolved, and this has led to an ongoing issue. As the potholes continue to worsen, drivers are attempting to avoid them by driving onto the grass verges, which is causing damage. We would appreciate it if someone could attend the location to assess both the condition of the road and the impact on the surrounding area. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitelands Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
